00010     {
00011         internal short year;
00012         internal short month;

00021     [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]
00022     internal struct SatelliteArray
00023     {
00024         int a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i, j, k, l;
00025 
00026         public int Count
00027         {
00028             get { return 12; }
00029         }
00030 
00031         public int this[int value]
00032         {
00033             get
00034             {
00035                 if (value == 0) return a;
00036                 else if (value == 1) return b;
00037                 else if (value == 2) return c;
00038                 else if (value == 3) return d;
00039                 else if (value == 4) return e;
00040                 else if (value == 5) return f;
00041                 else if (value == 6) return g;
00042                 else if (value == 7) return h;
00043                 else if (value == 8) return i;
00044                 else if (value == 9) return j;
00045                 else if (value == 10) return k;
00046                 else if (value == 11) return l;
00047                 else throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("value must be 0 - 11");
00048             }
00049         }
00050     }
00051     #endregion

00153     [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]
00154     public class GpsPosition
00155     {
00156         internal GpsPosition() { }
00157         internal static int GPS_VALID_UTC_TIME = 0x00000001;
00158         internal static int GPS_VALID_LATITUDE = 0x00000002;
00159         internal static int GPS_VALID_LONGITUDE = 0x00000004;
00160         internal static int GPS_VALID_SPEED = 0x00000008;
00161         internal static int GPS_VALID_HEADING = 0x00000010;
00162         internal static int GPS_VALID_MAGNETIC_VARIATION = 0x00000020;
00163         internal static int GPS_VALID_ALTITUDE_WRT_SEA_LEVEL = 0x00000040;
00164         internal static int GPS_VALID_ALTITUDE_WRT_ELLIPSOID = 0x00000080;
00165         internal static int GPS_VALID_POSITION_DILUTION_OF_PRECISION = 0x00000100;
00166         internal static int GPS_VALID_HORIZONTAL_DILUTION_OF_PRECISION = 0x00000200;
00167         internal static int GPS_VALID_VERTICAL_DILUTION_OF_PRECISION = 0x00000400;
00168         internal static int GPS_VALID_SATELLITE_COUNT = 0x00000800;
00169         internal static int GPS_VALID_SATELLITES_USED_PRNS = 0x00001000;
00170         internal static int GPS_VALID_SATELLITES_IN_VIEW = 0x00002000;
00171         internal static int GPS_VALID_SATELLITES_IN_VIEW_PRNS = 0x00004000;
00172         internal static int GPS_VALID_SATELLITES_IN_VIEW_ELEVATION = 0x00008000;
00173         internal static int GPS_VALID_SATELLITES_IN_VIEW_AZIMUTH = 0x00010000;
00174         internal static int GPS_VALID_SATELLITES_IN_VIEW_SIGNAL_TO_NOISE_RATIO = 0x00020000;
00175 
00176 
00177         internal int dwVersion = 1;             // Current version of GPSID client is using.
00178         internal int dwSize = 0;                // sizeof(_GPS_POSITION)
00179 
00180         // Not all fields in the structure below are guaranteed to be valid.  
00181         // Which fields are valid depend on GPS device being used, how stale the API allows
00182         // the data to be, and current signal.
00183         // Valid fields are specified in dwValidFields, based on GPS_VALID_XXX flags.
00184         internal int dwValidFields = 0;
00185 
00186         // Additional information about this location structure (GPS_DATA_FLAGS_XXX)
00187         internal int dwFlags = 0;
00188 
00189         //** Time related
00190         internal SystemTime stUTCTime = new SystemTime();       //  UTC according to GPS clock.
00191 
00192         //** Position + heading related
00193         internal double dblLatitude = 0.0;            // Degrees latitude.  North is positive
00194         internal double dblLongitude = 0.0;           // Degrees longitude.  East is positive
00195         internal float flSpeed = 0.0f;                // Speed in knots
00196         internal float flHeading = 0.0f;              // Degrees heading (course made good).  True North=0
00197         internal double dblMagneticVariation = 0.0;   // Magnetic variation.  East is positive
00198         internal float flAltitudeWRTSeaLevel = 0.0f;  // Altitute with regards to sea level, in meters
00199         internal float flAltitudeWRTEllipsoid = 0.0f; // Altitude with regards to ellipsoid, in meters
00200 
00201         //** Quality of this fix
00202         // Where did we get fix from?
00203         internal FixQuality fixQuality = FixQuality.Unknown;        
00204         // Is this 2d or 3d fix?
00205         internal FixType fixType = FixType.Unknown;      
00206         // Auto or manual selection between 2d or 3d mode
00207         internal FixSelection selectionType = FixSelection.Unknown;     
00208         // Position Dilution Of Precision
00209         internal float flPositionDilutionOfPrecision = 0.0f;
00210         // Horizontal Dilution Of Precision
00211         internal float flHorizontalDilutionOfPrecision = 0.0f; 
00212         // Vertical Dilution Of Precision
00213         internal float flVerticalDilutionOfPrecision = 0.0f;   
00214 
00215         //** Satellite information
00216         // Number of satellites used in solution
00217         internal int dwSatelliteCount = 0;               
00218         // PRN numbers of satellites used in the solution
00219         internal SatelliteArray rgdwSatellitesUsedPRNs = new SatelliteArray();
00220         // Number of satellites in view.  From 0-GPS_MAX_SATELLITES
00221         internal int dwSatellitesInView = 0;                                               
00222         // PRN numbers of satellites in view
00223         internal SatelliteArray rgdwSatellitesInViewPRNs = new SatelliteArray();                
00224         // Elevation of each satellite in view
00225         internal SatelliteArray rgdwSatellitesInViewElevation = new SatelliteArray();           
00226         // Azimuth of each satellite in view
00227         internal SatelliteArray rgdwSatellitesInViewAzimuth = new SatelliteArray();             
00228         // Signal to noise ratio of each satellite in view
00229         internal SatelliteArray rgdwSatellitesInViewSignalToNoiseRatio = new SatelliteArray();  
00230 
00234         public DateTime Time
00235         {
00236             get
00237             {
00238                 DateTime time = new DateTime(stUTCTime.year, stUTCTime.month, stUTCTime.day, stUTCTime.hour, stUTCTime.minute, stUTCTime.second, stUTCTime.millisecond);
00239                 return time;
00240             }
00241 
00242         }
00246         public bool TimeValid
00247         {
00248             get { return (dwValidFields & GPS_VALID_UTC_TIME) != 0; }
00249         }
00250 
00251 
00256         public Satellite[] GetSatellitesInSolution()
00257         {
00258             Satellite[] inViewSatellites = GetSatellitesInView();
00259             ArrayList list = new ArrayList();
00260             for (int index = 0; index < dwSatelliteCount; index++)
00261             {
00262                 Satellite found = null;
00263                 for (int viewIndex = 0; viewIndex < inViewSatellites.Length && found == null; viewIndex++)
00264                 {
00265                     if (rgdwSatellitesUsedPRNs[index] == inViewSatellites[viewIndex].Id)
00266                     {
00267                         found = inViewSatellites[viewIndex];
00268                         list.Add(found);
00269                     }
00270                 }
00271             }
00272 
00273             return (Satellite[])list.ToArray(typeof(Satellite));
00274         }
00278         public bool SatellitesInSolutionValid
00279         {
00280             get { return (dwValidFields & GPS_VALID_SATELLITES_USED_PRNS) != 0; }
00281         }
00282 
00283 
00284 
00289         public Satellite[] GetSatellitesInView()
00290         {
00291             Satellite[] satellites = null;
00292             if (dwSatellitesInView != 0)
00293             {
00294                 satellites = new Satellite[dwSatellitesInView];
00295                 for (int index = 0; index < satellites.Length; index++)
00296                 {
00297                     satellites[index] = new Satellite();
00298                     satellites[index].Azimuth = rgdwSatellitesInViewAzimuth[index];
00299                     satellites[index].Elevation = rgdwSatellitesInViewElevation[index];
00300                     satellites[index].Id = rgdwSatellitesInViewPRNs[index];
00301                     satellites[index].SignalStrength = rgdwSatellitesInViewSignalToNoiseRatio[index];
00302                 }
00303             }
00304 
00305             return satellites;
00306         }
00310         public bool SatellitesInViewValid
00311         {
00312             get { return (dwValidFields & GPS_VALID_SATELLITES_IN_VIEW) != 0; }
00313         }
00314
